content: these mini pockets give you a cute way to carry life s little essentials with you when you re on the go they re great for storing panty liners eyeglass wipes small pill blister packs earphones etc they re also a quick make for last-minute gifts or market stalls because of their interesting construction there is no sewing involved except for attaching the button each measures about 3 square a 3/4 button is required for each pocket they only require a small amount of 3-weight yarn cotton or acrylic and are a perfect project for beginning crocheters you have a choice of 2 styles one with a flower that hides the button hole and one without a flower with a regular button hole select which one suits your style and skill level this project is delivered as a very beginner-friendly youtube tutorial on my brave new hook channel the written instructions are included in the video s description
